job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Its fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what theyre doingltbrgtltbrgtltemgtWere committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the businessltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltstronggtThe Role ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWe are looking for a seasoned professional to lead design ampamp develop our flagship spam detection products You get to work with some of the largest threat intelligence data in the cyber security and craft peta byte scale solutions to help protect some of the most targeted people especially in fortune 1000 companies Youll build hybrid systems that take the best of rules based and machine learning based approaches in real real time and process billions of messages every day A few seconds could make all the difference between a security breach and a blocked message In succeeding with Proofpoint you help make the internet a safer place for everyoneltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYour daytoday ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtYou have solid understanding of algorithms ampamp data structures along with their runtime complexitiesltligtltligtYou are confident in building and troubleshooting highly performant and multithreaded applications at scaleltligtltligtYou understand the complexities and tradeoffs for building systems with 9999 and 99999 availabilityltligtltligtComfortable working with cloud platforms like AWS or GCP especially in a hybrid PrivatePublic cloud modelltligtltligtGood working knowledge of design and stability patterns ltligtltligtProvide technical leadership and up level to other members on the teamltligtltligtPartner with senior management on technical strategy and roadmapltligtltligtWork closely with data scientists to integrate machine learning models in productionltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat You Bring To The TeamltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors Degree or higher in a quantitative discipline or other relevant fieldltligtltligt8 experience in working with large scale distributed systemsltligtltligtExperience with one or more of popular programming languages CGoPython is requiredltligtltligtHas intellectual curiosity and stays abreast with current technologiesltligtltligtHigh accountability and a track record of delivering game changing products with qualityltligtltligtDeep customer focus Always start the with customer and work backwardsltligtltligtUnderstand lean software development practices and embrace data informed decisionsltligtltligtChallenges status quo and looks for continuous improvement in systems and processesltbrgtltligtltulgtltemgtIf you like wild growth and working with happy enthusiastic overachievers youll enjoy your career with usltbrgtltbrgtltemgt
